creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: right of a pair of six-panel folding screens; each panel framed in gilt; four panels at left have connected, looping calligraphy with three columns per panel; red seal in URC of third panel from right; second panel from right has two very large characters and a short line of small characters at left edge, with two red seals below; rightmost panel has two very large characters and red seal in URC
marks: [醉翁亭記　環滁皆山也。其西南諸峰，林壑尤美。望之蔚然而深秀者，琅琊也。山行六七里，漸聞水聲潺潺，而
medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink on paper
title: Ouyang Xiu's The Old Drunkard's Pavillion [pt. 1, right]
